extendedInfo.description: Name Generator for DMs/GMs, players and writers.  Primarily for Fantasy Games, but could be used for others.  The names are abit random, but it is to give ideas.  You can use it as is or modify the name to your tastes.  Besides, it's FREE!Please note that network access is only for ads.  I do not collect any information about you or your phone.  The entire program is self contained, it does not have to have network access to work.Thanks for the great feedback.  As asked I will work on adding titles for the next release.  And I will look in to making an NPC generator.  I have tons of books for reference so it should be fun.  And of course it will be free.  Any other ideas please email me or leave it in the feedback.

reviews.title: Nice work!
reviews.comment: Great table top rpg name generator. 5 stars .... Now I just need to find a good npc personality / interest generator (nudge). Thanks for the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wahoa! Loads of names, really good for fantasy! How about some titles, too? Titles and names are best ways of coming up with a story.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: as it says.
reviews.comment: it is as it says... perfect for quick dm\'ing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Whoever said the letters are random obviously has little skill at fantasy. The names are useful in a fantasy setting or can be easily modified.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The names are mostly a mixture of letters.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just a list
reviews.comment: A couple were cool but some are unpronounceable. Maybe add a search for male/female/unisex and a faves list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So so.
reviews.comment: I bumped up the score for only needing to be online (I hate when apps need permission to do everything). I would have given it a higher score if you could somehow filter out some names. By nationality, for example. Still, it helps you come up with your own names.
reviews.author: Ernest Trafford
